titleStmt.title: A breviate of saving knowledge, or, The principles of Christian religion methodically digested into short questions and answers purposely composed and published, for the use and benefit of such as have good desires but weake memories, by I.B.
titleStmt.author: Brinsley, John, 1600-1665.
